derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French desflourer, from a variant of late Latin deflorare, from de- (expressing removal) + Latin flos, flor- 'a flower'

entry.def: When a woman is deflowered, she has sexual intercourse with a man for the first time.

example.ex: Nora was deflowered by a man who worked in a soda-water factory.
example.tran: 在汽水厂工作的一个男子夺去了诺拉的童贞。

sentences.sentence: "This dirty old man deflowered several young girls in the village"
